task.title: Spheres
task.shortdesc: You can create spheres. The latitude lines of a sphere are always parallel with the xy plane of the cur ent UCS; the central axis is always parallel with the z-axis. You position a sphere by specifying its center point. You determine the size of a sphere by specifying either its radius or its diameter.

context.p: To create a dome or dish, combine a sphere with a box and use SUBTRACT. If you want to create a spherical object with additional details, create a 2D profile and use REVOLVE to define a rotation angle about the Z axis. The 3D command creates a spherical shape defined by surfaces only.

step.cmd: Choose Draw > Solids > Sphere from the mainmenu.
Specify the center of the sphere.
